justification: "Language proficiency was also measured with the Oxford Placement Test (OPT; Allan, 2004), by administering 25 multiple choice questions and a cloze test."
"Participants' language proficiency was assessed through questionnaires ... to self-rate the language skills on a scale that ranged from 1 (= no knowledge of L1/L2) to 6 (= perfect knowledge)."
"At the end of the session, participants completed a Risk Attitude Scale ranging from 1 (= conservative) to 5 (= adventure) (Weber et al., 2002)."

"We aimed at assessing the influence of these three factors on participants' subsequent decisions in an even-probability Gambling task (Gao et al., 2015; Zheng et al., 2019) ... Participants had to decide ... whether to bet by pressing 1 (= play) or not to bet."
